topic.title: Exercise: tabl003 - Title field with list box

section.p: Some customers appreciate that their title is listed with a mailing. Add a field Title to table Customers. Use data type Lookup Wizard to produce a list with the values: ing. , ir., drs., mr., dr.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Open table Customers in design view. Add field Title. Set data type on Lookup Wizard…. Specify in the next dialog that the values ​​are typed. Only one column is necessary. In this column enter the values: ing., ir., drs., mr., dr. Use as caption text Title.
